resourceDescription_FoodRaw.english: Your colonists need food to survive. Every type you gather is raw at first and can be cooked.
resourceDescription_FoodRaw.german: Deine Kolonisten brauchen Nahrung zum überleben. Jede Art von Nahrung die du sammelst ist zuerst roh und kann dann gekocht werden.
resourceDescription_FoodRaw.french: Vos colons ont besoin de nourriture pour survivre. Chaque récolte est crue au début et peut être cuisinée
resourceDescription_FoodRaw.spanish: Tus colonos necesitan sobrevivir. Cualquier tipo de cultivo que recolectes está crudo y puede ser cocinado.
resourceDescription_FoodRaw.turkish: Yerleşimcilerin hayatta kalmak için yiyeceğe ihtiyaçları var. Topladığınız yiyecekler çiğ ancak pişirilebilir.
resourceDescription_FoodRaw.portuguese: Seus colonos precisam de comida para sobreviver. Cada tipo que você coleta é cru a princípio e pode ser cozido.

resourceDescription_FoodCooked.english: A colonist will take cooked food over raw food every time. Colonists get happy thoughts from eating cooked food.
resourceDescription_FoodCooked.german: Ein Kolonist wird immer gekochtes Essen gegenüber rohem Essen bevorzugen. Durch solche Mahlzeiten bekommen sie frohe Gedanken.
resourceDescription_FoodCooked.french: Un colon prendra des aliments cuits à la place des aliments crus. Les colons obtiennent de bonnes pensées lorsqu'ils mangent des aliments cuits.
resourceDescription_FoodCooked.spanish: Un colono siempre preferirá comida cocinada a comida cruda. Además, obtienen buenos pensamientos al comer comida cocinada.
resourceDescription_FoodCooked.turkish: Yerleşimciler pişmiş yemekleri çiğ yemelere tercih eder ve ilk önce pişmiş olanlara gider. Pişmiş yiyecekler onları mutlu eder.
resourceDescription_FoodCooked.portuguese: Um colono levará comida cozida sobre comida crua toda vez. Os colonos têm pensamentos felizes de comer comida cozida.

resourceName_SimpleMeal.french: Aliment Cuisiné au Feu de Camp

resourceDescription_IronOre.english: In order to produce more advanced tools, weapons and armor, you need to find and mine iron ore.
resourceDescription_IronOre.german: Um fortgeschrittene Werkzeuge, Waffen und Rüstungen zu produzieren, musst du Eisenerz finden und abbauen.
resourceDescription_IronOre.french: Pour fabriquer des outils améliorés, des armes et des armures, vous devez trouver et miner du fer
resourceDescription_IronOre.spanish: Para producir herramientas más avanzadas, armas y armadura, primero tienes que encontrar mineral de hierro y picarlo.
resourceDescription_IronOre.turkish: Daha gelişmiş aletler, silahlar ve zırhlar üretmek için demir cevheri bulmanız ve çıkarmanız gerekiyor.
resourceDescription_IronOre.portuguese: Para produzir ferramentas mais avançadas, armas e armaduras, você precisa encontrar e extrair minério de ferro.

resourceDescription_Stone.english: Anytime you want to build something durable and fire-proof, you should prefer stone over wood.
resourceDescription_Stone.german: Immer wenn du etwas starkes und feuerfestes bauen willst, solltest du Stein gegenüber Holz bevorzugen.
resourceDescription_Stone.french: À chaque fois que vous voudrez construire quelque chose de durable et résistant au feu, utilisez de la pierre à la place du bois
resourceDescription_Stone.spanish: Siempre que quieras construir algo duradero e ignífugo, deberías elegir piedra por encima de la madera.
resourceDescription_Stone.turkish: Dayanıklı ve yangına dayanıklı bir şey inşa etmek istediğinizde, ahşap üzerine taş tercih etmelisiniz.
resourceDescription_Stone.portuguese: Sempre que você quiser construir algo durável e à prova de fogo, você deve preferir pedra em vez de madeira.

resourceDescription_HealingPlant.english: Healing plants can be found in the wild or cultivated at home. They are a vital ingredient for most medical supplies.
resourceDescription_HealingPlant.german: Heilpflanzen können in der Wildnis gefunden oder Zuhause angebaut werden. Sie sind ein wichtiger Bestandteil vieler medizinischer Rezepte.
resourceDescription_HealingPlant.french: Les plantes médicinales peuvent être trouvées dans la nature ou être culvitées à la maison. Elles sont un ingrédient vital pour les fournitures médicales
resourceDescription_HealingPlant.spanish: Las plantas medicinales se pueden encontrar o cultivar. Son un ingrediente principal para la mayoría de suministros médicos.
resourceDescription_HealingPlant.turkish: Şifalı bitkiler vahşi doğada bulunabilir veya bahçede yetiştirilebilir. Çoğu tıbbi malzeme için hayati bir unsurdur.
resourceDescription_HealingPlant.portuguese: Plantas curativas podem ser encontradas na natureza ou cultivadas em casa. Eles são um ingrediente vital para a maioria dos suprimentos médicos.

resourceDescription_HealingPotion.english: When your colonists are wounded, it's best to give them healing potions to speed up the healing process.
resourceDescription_HealingPotion.german: Wenn deine Kolonisten verletzt sind, solltest du ihnen Heiltränke verabreichen um die Heilung in Gang zu bringen.
resourceDescription_HealingPotion.spanish: Cuando tus colonos se encuentran heridos, darles una poción de salud ayudará a acelerar el proceso.
resourceDescription_HealingPotion.french: Lorsque vos colons sont blessés, il est préférable de leur donner des potions de soin pour accélérer le processus de guérison.
resourceDescription_HealingPotion.turkish: Yerleşimcileriniz yaralandığında, iyileşme sürecini hızlandırmak için onlara iyileştirici iksir vermek en iyisidir.
resourceDescription_HealingPotion.portuguese: Quando seus colonos estão feridos, é melhor dar-lhes poções de cura para acelerar o processo de cura.

resourceDescription_Medicine.english: There are various illnesses your colonists can get. This medicine treats most of them.
resourceDescription_Medicine.german: Es gibt verschiedene Krankheiten, die deine Kolonisten bekommen können. Diese Medizin heilt die meisten davon.
resourceDescription_Medicine.french: Il y a plusieurs maladies que vos colons peuvent attraper. La médecine traite la plupart d'entre elles.
resourceDescription_Medicine.spanish: Tus colonos pueden sufrir varias enfermedades. Esta medicina puede tratar la gran mayoría.
resourceDescription_Medicine.turkish: Yerleşimcilerinizin kapabileceği çeşitli hastalıklar var. Bu ilaç çoğunu tedavi ediyor.
resourceDescription_Medicine.portuguese: Existem várias doenças que seus colonos podem ter. Este medicamento trata a maioria deles.

resourceDescription_Wood.english: Most things can be made out of wood in one way or another. This includes Walls, Doors, Floors, Furniture, Tools and Weapons.
resourceDescription_Wood.german: Die meisten Dinge können irgendwie aus Holz hergestellt werden. Dazu gehören Wände, Türen, Böden, Möbel, Werkzeuge und Waffen.
resourceDescription_Wood.french: Plusieurs choses peuvent être faite de bois. Cela inclut les murs, portes, sols, mobiliers, outils et armes.
resourceDescription_Wood.spanish: Casi todo puede construirse con madera, de una manera u otra. Esto incluye paredes, puertas, suelos, mobiliario, armas o herramientas.
resourceDescription_Wood.turkish: Çoğu şey tahtadan bir şekilde yapılabilir. Buna Duvarlar, Kapılar, Döşemeler, Mobilya, Araçlar ve Silahlar dahildir.
resourceDescription_Wood.portuguese: A maioria das coisas pode ser feita de madeira de uma forma ou de outra. Isso inclui paredes, portas, pisos, móveis, ferramentas e armas.

resourceDescription_Cotton.english: Cotton is used for all things that are made out of cloth. This includes stuff like beds, bandages and clothes.
resourceDescription_Cotton.german: Baumwolle wird für alles benötigt, das aus Stoff gemacht ist. Dazu gehören Betten, Verbände und Kleidung.
resourceDescription_Cotton.french: Le coton est utilisé pour toute chose qui requiert du tissu. Cela inclut les affaires comme les lits, les bandages et les vêtements.
resourceDescription_Cotton.spanish: El algodón se usa para todo aquello que requiera tela. Esto incluye camas, vendas y ropa.
resourceDescription_Cotton.turkish: Pamuk, kumaştan yapılmış her şey için kullanılır. Buna yatak, bandaj ve kıyafet gibi şeyler dahildir.
resourceDescription_Cotton.portuguese: O algodão é usado para todas as coisas que são feitas de pano. Isso inclui coisas como camas, bandagens e roupas.

resourceDescription_Crystal.english: A crystal is a gem with many interesting properties. Your colonists can gather and study them as a way of doing research.
resourceDescription_Crystal.german: Ein Kristall ist ein Stein mit vielen interessanten Eigenschaften. Deine Kolonisten können sie sammeln und untersuchen um zu forschen.
resourceDescription_Crystal.french: Un cristal est une gemme avec des propriétés intéressantes. Vos colons peuvent les récolter et les étudier et ainsi faire de la recherche.
resourceDescription_Crystal.spanish: Un cristal es una gema con muchas propiedades interesantes. Tus colonos pueden recolectarlos y estudiarlos para sus investigaciones.
resourceDescription_Crystal.turkish: Kristal, birçok ilginç özelliğe sahip bir mücevherdir. Kolonistler, onları araştırma yapmanın bir yolu olarak toplayabilir ve çalışabilir.
resourceDescription_Crystal.portuguese: A crystal is a gem with many interesting properties. Your colonists can gather and study them as a way of doing research.

resourceDescription_Scroll.english: Ancient secrets are written on these scrolls. Experienced scholars can discover technology by carefully studying their texts.
resourceDescription_Scroll.german: Uralte Geheimnisse stehen auf diesen Schriftrollen. Erfahrene Gelehrte können durch sorgfältige Studien Technologien entdecken.
resourceDescription_Scroll.french: Des anciennes légendes sont écrites sur ces parchemins. Les érudits expérimentés peuvent découvrir des technologies en étudiant ces textes.

resourceDescription_Coins.english: Money makes the world go round. Trade with other factions, pay your colonists, or use your coins to finance extravagant furniture.
resourceDescription_Coins.german: Geld regiert die Welt. Handle mit anderen Völkern, bezahle deine Kolinisten oder benutze deine Münzen um extravagante Möbel zu finanzieren.
resourceDescription_Coins.french: L'argent fait fonctionner le monde. Echanger avec d'autres clans, payer vos colons, ou utiliser vos pièces pour financer du mobilier extravagant.
